name: nuravora
body:
Varun Arora

Electronics and Electrical Communication Engineering

PEC University of Technology, Chandigarh

Home Academics Interests Projects Resume Contact Me

Hi there! Looks like you've landed on my territory. I'm Varun Arora, currently a student in Electronics and Electrical Communication Engineering at the PEC University of Technology, Chandigarh. I belong to Chandigarh, India and completed my higher education at G.M.S.S.S.-33/D, Chandigarh.

Academics

  • B Tech in Electronics and Electrical Communication Engineering.
  • CGPA 7.9 at the end of four semesters
  • Secured all India Rank 1 in Maths and Rank 4 in PCM (Physics Chemistry Maths) PU-CET 2012
  • Secured all India Rank 3446 in AIEEE 2012 out of 12,00,000 students
  • Secured all India Rank 12030 in IIT-JEE 2012
  • 88.2 % aggregate and 95 % in PCM (Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics) in CBSE Standard XII exams

Interests

  • Coding
  • Accounting and Finance
  • Playing Football and Basketball

Projects

  1. Dual Tone Multi Frequency (DTMF)Prof. DivyaDecember 2013

    • Designed a Dual Tone Multi Frequency (DTMF) decoder and LED's are controlled via a cellular phone (using IC MT8870).
    • Remotely controlled various processes using the CellPhone


  2. Automated Attendance Using Barcode Reader in LabVIEWProf. Sukhwinder SinghMay 2014

    • Designed an automatic attendance system in LabVIEW that marks your attendance by recognizing the barcode of the SID and analyze the attendance records.
